bach.DataFrame.drop¶

DataFrame.drop(labels=None, index=None, columns=None, level=None, inplace=False, errors='raise')[source]¶

Drop columns from the DataFrame

Parameters

  • labels (Optional[List[str]]) – not supported

  • index (Optional[List[str]]) – not supported

  • columns (Optional[List[str]]) – the list of columns to drop.

  • level (Optional[int]) – not supported

  • inplace (bool) – update the current DataFrame or return a new DataFrame.

  • errors (str) – ‘raise’ or ‘ignore’ missing key errors.

Returns

DataFrame without the removed columns or None if inplace=True.

Return type

Optional[bach.dataframe.DataFrame]
